Articles.Content:
Ok, my first AAR mission report. So I'm running 1.0.2 with these mods:

> 
> CoolRockets
> 
> Smokescreen
> 
> Stock clamshell fairings
> 
> Procedural fairings
> 
> KW rocketry
> 
> HotRockets
> 
> KER
> 
> Camera Tools
> 
> MechJeb
> 
> Kerbal Alarm Clock
> 
> Temperature Gauge Killer
> 
> Cacteye
> 
> Hullcam VDS
> 
> DMagic orbital sciences
> 
> EngineLight
> 
> 

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

- - - Updated - - -

Ok here's the settings I'm using. I have Quickloading loaded because my computer crashes when running KSP quite often.

![ZiK1CLx.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZiK1CLx.png)

- - - Updated - - -

First Launch: KUEA1

**Pilot**: Jebadiah Kerman

Success or Failure: **Success**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/yKQCS)

- - - Updated - - -

In the meantime following the success of the first flight, Bob Kerman gets science from the runway

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/DDrpa)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-29T23:55:43Z" title="09/29/2015 11:55  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 29, 2015</time> by Bev7787**
  
More mods

The KUEA finally has its own flag!

![ghfxE6W.jpg](http://imgur.com/ghfxE6W.jpg)
KUEA pics coming shortly. Next up: Suborbital flight

Pilot: Jebadiah Kerman

Success/failure: **Partial Failure**

Bonus- Suborbital flight. Lots of science

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/6XdbA)

Orbiter m2 was more science and suborbital. It won't be posted with images. Orbiter m2r is next

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-28T06:20:43Z" title="07/28/2015 06:20  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 28, 2015</time> by Bev7787**

Pilot: Jebadiah Kerman

Success/Failure: **Success**

Bonus- Two contracts completed

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/R90je)

Pilot: N/A

Success/Failure: **Success**

Munsat1's mission was to orbit the Mun and transmit science, which it successfully did before dying due to power shortages.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/%5B/color%5D%5Bcolor=#000000%5D%5B/color%5DLPJM1)

Pilot: Valentina Kerman

Success/Failure: **Failure**

Notes: Hey we got the contract done!!!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/hf2Oi)
KUEA Mun mk1 is also a failure. Supposed to flyby Mun, instead settled for an eccentric orbit with enough fuel to return. Investigations are underway

KUEA's 7th flight was a top secret government polar orbiting satellite. Everything else is classified.

Success or Failure: **CLASSIFIED**

\_\_\_\_\_

KUEA's 8th flight rescued Aldny Kerman in a first for the program and in the process pulling of a major PR coup.

Objectives: Rescue Aldny Kerman and bring him back to Kerbin.

Success/Failure: **Success**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/vXt5H)

EDIT: I'm having issues with album titles and descriptions. Anyone know why?

You you might also be wondering about Flight 6, that is a secret.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-29T23:53:08Z" title="09/29/2015 11:53  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 29, 2015</time> by Bev7787**

Example:

USM-1001-Mu

USM- Union Space Mission

1001- First mission of Year 1

-Mu- Mun mission, Kerbin missions have no suffix, others listed below:

Mi- Minmus

M- Moho

E- Eve system

Du- Duna system

D- Dres

J- Jool system

Ee- Eeloo

ARM- Asteroid Redirect Mission

K- Solar mission

R- Rescue mission e.g. Duna rescue mission will be USM-xxxx-R, not DuR.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-11T00:45:44Z" title="10/11/2015 12:45  AM" data-short="8 yr">October 11, 2015</time> by Bev7787**

Mission Objective- Complete the contract and become Kerbin's first geostationary satellite.

Success/Failure: **Success**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/oQut6)

Succes/Failure: **Success**

I will be dormant for a while so see you soon.
